script.title: DV360 To BigQuery
script.description: Move existing DV360 reports into a BigQuery table.
instructions: Specify either report name or report id to move a report.
A schema is recommended, if not provided it will be guessed.
The most recent valid file will be moved to the table.

field.name: dbm_report_id
field.description: DV360 report ID given in UI, not needed if name used.

field.name: dbm_report_name
field.description: Name of report, not needed if ID used.

field.name: dbm_table
field.description: Table to create from this report.

field.name: dbm_schema
field.description: Schema provided in JSON list format or empty list.

field.name: is_incremental_load
field.description: Clear data in destination table during this report's time period, then append report data to destination table.
